headline: Palo Alto Networks Targets AI Security Edge With Chronosphere Observability Deal
summary: Palo Alto Networks (NasdaqGS:PANW) has completed its acquisition of Chronosphere. The deal brings observability and monitoring technology into PANW's AI-driven cybersecurity platform. The transaction is expected to influence how enterprises secure AI workloads and large data volumes. Palo Alto Networks operates across network security, cloud security, and security operations, and Chronosphere adds observability tools that focus on real-time data from complex systems. As AI-driven...
